00040 
00042     void setName(QString n ) { sname = n; };   
00044     QString getName() { return sname; };
00046     void setDescription(QString d ) { sdescription = d; };   
00048     QString getDescription() { return sdescription; };
00050     void setCode(int c) { code = c; };   
00052     int getCode() { return code; };
00054     void setEndState(bool es=TRUE) { endstate = es; };
00056     void toggleEndState() { endstate=!endstate; };
00058     bool isEndState() { return endstate; }
